mapper.select: SELECT r.*, c.name as course_name, l.title as lesson_title, u.username as teacher_name FROM user_study_record r LEFT JOIN course c ON r.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN lesson l ON r.lesson_id = l.id LEFT JOIN user u ON c.teacher_id = u.id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.study_date DESC, r.create_time DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_study_record ( user_id, course_id, lesson_id, study_duration, study_date, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{courseId}, #{lessonId}, #{studyDuration}, #{studyDate}, NOW(), NOW() )
